scripts.bootstrap: npm run bootstrap:codemod && lerna bootstrap --hoist --strict  --ignore @pankod/refine-codemod --ignore @pankod/refine-react-router --scope @pankod/refine* --scope create-refine-app
scripts.nuke: echo 'Removing all node_modules, builds and lockfiles'; npm run nuke:node_modules; npm run nuke:builds; npm run nuke:lockfiles;
scripts.coffee: npm run nuke && npm i && npm run bootstrap && npm run build
scripts.start:docs: concurrently "cd documentation && npm run start" "npm run start -- --scope @pankod/refine-live-previews" --names docs,live --prefix-colors blue,red
scripts.nuke:builds: lerna exec -- rm -rf dist && lerna exec -- rm -rf .next && lerna exec -- rm -rf build
scripts.nuke:lockfiles: lerna exec --ignore @pankod/refine-codemod -- rm -rf package-lock.json && lerna exec --ignore @pankod/refine-codemod -- rm -rf yarn.lock && lerna exec --ignore @pankod/refine-codemod -- rm -rf pnpm-lock.yaml
